Question
========

The preferred way to contribute to someone else's repository is to send them a _________.


Answerlist
----------

* pull request
* friend request
* LinkedIn message
* link to a shared Google Doc
* URL

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Correct.
* No, that's Facebook.
* No, no one wants to get LinkedIn messages.
* No, don't put your code in a Google Doc.
* No, this makes more work for the maintainer.
